arts.ttl: Simons grabs impressive double as Leipzig sends Wolfsburg to fourth straight loss
arts.sum: Xavi Simons scored twice as Leipzig weathered a late comeback to beat Wolfsburg 3-2 in the Bundesliga on Friday and win away from home for the first time this year. Leipzig took possession when a defender slipped and Xavi Simons made space for himself on the edge of the box and his low shot beat the goalkeeper in the exact same place.

arts.ttl: Simons grabs impressive double as Leipzig sends Wolfsburg to fourth straight loss
arts.sum: Xavi Simons' brace, including a sublime 25-meter curler, helped Leipzig end their away drought with a 3-2 win over Wolfsburg. Despite a late comeback, Wolfsburg remains 12th.

arts.ttl: Xavi Simons' brace enough for RB Leipzig despite Wolfsburg fightback
arts.sum: Xavi struck twice and Loïs Openda was also on target as RB Leipzig earned a 3-2 win over Wolfsburg in the Matchday 29 curtain-raiser, but they were made to sweat for the points after almost letting a 3-0 lead slip. Leipzig's control of the match continued, and they doubled their lead in the 26th minute through Xavi Simons .

arts.ttl: Leipzig climb to Champions League place with thrilling win
arts.sum: RB Leipzig survive a late scare to secure a vital win at the expense of out-of-form Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs RB Leipzig Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Wolfsburg, struggling in 12th place, host RB Leipzig, who are aiming to cement their place in the Champions League spots, on April 11th at 19:30 at the Volkswagen Arena. Ahead of the game, we’v...

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs. Leipzig preview: Die roten Bullen are aiming for 3rd place
arts.sum: RB Leipzig are determined to get back to 3rd place in the Bundesliga under new coach Zsolt Lőw when they travel to Volkswagen Arena for Friday's meeting with Wolfsburg and former coach Ralph Hasenhüttl.

arts.ttl: Latest from Germany: Cesc Fabregas now in picture with Crystal Palace and Sheffield Wednesday managers for RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Cesc Fabregas has been added to RB Leipzig’s list of potential managerial appointments alongside Sheffield Wednesday’s Danny Rohl and Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner. That’s according to journalist Philipp Hinze, who reports that the former Premier League star, currently manager at Como, now finds himself on the list at the German side. RB Leipzig continue to chase for a place in the Champions League as they travel to Wolfsburg on Friday evening. Wolfsburg currently find themselves in 12th place with 38 points…

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig considering Cesc Fabregas, as they continue their search for a new head coach
arts.sum: Leipziger Volkszeitung reports that Cesc Fabregas is under consideration at RB Leipzig as they continue their search for Marco Rose’s replacement. Fabregas is currently the head coach of Italian side Como.…

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg injuries starting to clear up ahead of Leipzig clash
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg's injury crisis is beginning to ease as they prepare for Friday night's match against RB Leipzig.
